entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:57 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -0.3°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -5
